thread.title: 10 Great Televised Debates In American Political History
thread.title_full: 10 Great Televised Debates In American Political History - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: 10 Great Televised Debates In American Political History
text: The years leading up to an American election are a great time for those who enjoy political debates. The primaries usually offer an assortment of colorful characters duking it out while the presidential debates can be theatrical and sometimes tense. These rhetorical struggles often influence the course of American politics.
